original_text: So Elisha went back to his field. He took his pair of oxen and he killed them as a sacrifice. He burned wood from the plough to cook the meat. He gave the meat to the people who were there and they ate it. Then he left home to go with Elijah and to become his helper.
korean_text: 엘리사가 그를 떠나 돌아가서 한 겨릿소를 가져다가 잡고 소의 기구를 불살라 그 고기를 삶아 백성에게 주어 먹게 하고 일어나 엘리야를 따르며 수종 들었더라

sentences.original_text: So Elisha went back to his field
He took his pair of oxen
and he killed them as a sacrifice
He burned wood from the plough
He gave the meat to the people who were there
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 거기에 있던 사람들에게 고기를 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: Then he left home to go with Elijah
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나서 그는 집을 떠나 엘리야와 함께 가기 위해
